import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import './index.css'; import './style2.css'; class App extends React.Component { handleSubmit (event){ event.preventDefault(); var { uname, pass } = document.forms[0]; const userData = database.find((user) => user.username === uname.value); if (userData) { if (userData.password !== pass.value) { setErrorMessages({ name: "pass", message: "invalid password" }); } else { setIsSubmitted(true); } } else { setErrorMessages({ name: "uname", message: "invalid username" }); } } render(){ return (
